Title: Relates to exempting school buses from certain regulations on the percentage of zero-emission vehicles in manufacturers' sales fleets
Summary: Exempts school buses from certain regulations relating to the percentage of zero-emission vehicles in manufacturer's sales fleets of medium-duty and heavy-duty vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง19-0306-b, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to exempting school buses from certain regulations on the percentage of zero-emission vehicles in manufacturers' sales fleets
